body: The adaptation is great but I never knew about this until now so it was sorta new for me and I liked it :)
Noice, also noice about the hentai adaptation

Fooound it: - http://hentaihaven.org/zton-jingai-animation-a-beautiful-greed-nulu-nulu-episode-1/ - FYI, it's several of Z-tons works, specifically Fist-festia and its sequel, Tentacle Legion, and then Diamond Lily. Also note, that blank white panel where they have the sex off-screen here? that's literally all the animation is. All told, it's kind of low quality animation, if you're at all familiar with flash you can practically see the moving parts, but eh, it was neat to see Z-ton stuff animated I guess.
Omg theres a hentai adaptation of this now! I lost my mind when I saw it lol.
